Clifton is known for its extravaganza. Luxurious villas greet you along your spinal drive through the outskirt of Cape Town. Property prices are sky high. Nonetheless a small group of accommodation suppliers are offering a night at one of these Jet-set villas, ranging from affordable to 4-digit numbers.

value: content=Two luxurious villas are Tuscan-style architecture and range from 3 to 8 rooms.
price=From R800 per night for a studio apartment to R35,000 per night for a ultra-luxurious villa, we have a full range or properties in Cape Town's most exclusive suburbs.

For Clifton Tourism Information, you can address the general information center in Cape Town, South Africa.
